item.title: Grand Exchange 317 Code
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Sup22211:

The ge interface is the only problem

straight from r-s m8

[code=java]public static void mainGrandExchange(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(24500);
setChildren(27, Interface);
addSprite(24501, 1, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”);
addHoverButton(24502, “Interfaces/GE/SPRITE”, 1, 21, 21, “Close”, 250, 24503, 3);
addHoveredButton(24503, “Interfaces/GE/SPRITE”, 3, 21, 21, 24504);
addHoverButton(24505, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24506, 1);
addHoveredButton(24506, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24507);
addHoverButton(24508, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24509, 1);
addHoveredButton(24509, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24510);
addHoverButton(24514, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24515, 1);
addHoveredButton(24515, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24516);
addHoverButton(24517, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24518, 1);
addHoveredButton(24518, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24519);
addHoverButton(24520, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24521, 1);
addHoveredButton(24521, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24522);
addHoverButton(24523, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 2, 50, 50, “Buy”, 0, 24524, 1);
addHoveredButton(24524, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 4, 50, 50, 24525);
addHoverButton(24511, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24512, 1);
addHoveredButton(24512, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24513);
addHoverButton(24526, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24527, 1);
addHoveredButton(24527, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24528);
addHoverButton(24529, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24530, 1);
addHoveredButton(24530, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24531);
addHoverButton(24532, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24533, 1);
addHoveredButton(24533, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24534);
addHoverButton(24535, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24536, 1);
addHoveredButton(24536, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24537);
addHoverButton(24538, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 3, 50, 50, “Sell”, 0, 24539, 1);
addHoveredButton(24539, “Interfaces/GE/NEW”, 5, 50, 50, 24540);
setBounds(24501, 4, 23, 0, Interface);
setBounds(24502, 480, 32, 1, Interface);
setBounds(24503, 480, 32, 2, Interface);
setBounds(24505, 45, 115, 3, Interface);
setBounds(24506, 45, 106, 4, Interface);
setBounds(24508, 45, 234, 5, Interface);
setBounds(24509, 45, 225, 6, Interface);
setBounds(24511, 105, 115, 7, Interface);
setBounds(24512, 105, 107, 8, Interface);
setBounds(24514, 358, 115, 9, Interface);
setBounds(24515, 358, 106, 10, Interface);
setBounds(24517, 202, 234, 11, Interface);
setBounds(24518, 202, 225, 12, Interface);
setBounds(24520, 358, 234, 13, Interface);
setBounds(24521, 358, 225, 14, Interface);
setBounds(24523, 202, 115, 15, Interface);
setBounds(24524, 202, 106, 16, Interface);
setBounds(24526, 261, 115, 17, Interface);
setBounds(24527, 261, 107, 18, Interface);
setBounds(24529, 417, 115, 19, Interface);
setBounds(24530, 417, 107, 20, Interface);
setBounds(24532, 105, 234, 21, Interface);
setBounds(24533, 105, 226, 22, Interface);
setBounds(24535, 261, 234, 23, Interface);
setBounds(24536, 261, 226, 24, Interface);
setBounds(24538, 417, 234, 25, Interface);
setBounds(24539, 417, 226, 26, Interface);
}

public static void buyingGrandExchange(RSFont[] TDA) {
	RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(32600);
	Interface.totalChildren(17);
	addSprite(32601, 1, "Interfaces/GE/grandexchangebackbuy");
	addText(32602, "0", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addText(32603, "0 gp", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addText(32604, "0 gp", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addHoverButton(32605, "Interfaces/GE/SPRITE", 1, 21, 21, "Close", 250, 24503, 3);
	addHoverButton(32606, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 21, 115, 50, "Confirm", 0, 32607, 1);
	addHoveredButton(32607, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 20, 115, 50, 1);
	addHoverButton(32608, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 23, 35, 25, "Enter custom amount", 0, 32, 1);
	addHoveredButton(32609, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 22, 35, 25, 32);
	addHoverButton(32610, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 29, 13, 13, "Add 1", 0, 54509, 1);
	addHoverButton(32611, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 27, 13, 13, "Subtract 1", 0, 54510, 1);
	addHoverButton(32612, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 29, 13, 13, "Add 1", 0, 54511, 1);
	addHoverButton(32613, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 27, 13, 13, "Subtract 1", 0, 54512, 1);
	addHoverButton(32614, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 23, 35, 25, "Enter custom amount", 0, 32609, 1);
	addHoveredButton(32615, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 22, 35, 25, 32);
	addHoverButton(32616, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 19, 35, 35, "Back to mainscreen", 0, 32609, 1);
	addHoveredButton(32617, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 18, 35, 35, 54514);
	Interface.child(0,32601,10,17);
	Interface.child(1,32602,110,176);
	Interface.child(2,32603,303,176);
	Interface.child(3,32604,200,238);
	Interface.child(4,32605,475,26);
	Interface.child(5,32606,199,266);
	Interface.child(6,32607,199,266);
	Interface.child(7,32608,127,201);
	Interface.child(8,32609,127,201);
	Interface.child(9,32610,53,176);
	Interface.child(10,32611,233,176);
	Interface.child(11,32612,268,176);
	Interface.child(12,32613,445,176);
	Interface.child(13,32614,341,201);
	Interface.child(14,32615,341,201);
	Interface.child(15,32616,51,279);
	Interface.child(16,32617,51,279);
}

public static void sellingGrandExchange(RSFont[] TDA) {
	RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(33600);
	Interface.totalChildren(17);
	addSprite(33601, 0, "Interfaces/GE/grandexchangebacksell");
	addText(33602, "0", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addText(33603, "0 gp", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addText(33604, "0 gp", 0xE9AB17, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
	addHoverButton(33605, "Interfaces/GE/SPRITE", 1, 21, 21, "Close", 250, 24503, 3);
	addHoverButton(33606, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 21, 115, 50, "Confirm", 0, 33607, 1);
	addHoveredButton(33607, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 20, 115, 50, 1);
	addHoverButton(33608, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 23, 35, 25, "Enter custom amount", 0, 32, 1);
	addHoveredButton(33609, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 22, 35, 25, 32);
	addHoverButton(33610, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 29, 13, 13, "Add 1", 0, 54509, 1);
	addHoverButton(33611, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 27, 13, 13, "Subtract 1", 0, 54510, 1);
	addHoverButton(33612, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 29, 13, 13, "Add 1", 0, 54511, 1);
	addHoverButton(33613, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 27, 13, 13, "Subtract 1", 0, 54512, 1);
	addHoverButton(33614, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 23, 35, 25, "Enter custom amount", 0, 33609, 1);
	addHoveredButton(33615, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 22, 35, 25, 32);
	addHoverButton(33616, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 19, 35, 35, "Back to mainscreen", 0, 33609, 1);
	addHoveredButton(33617, "Interfaces/GE/NEW", 18, 35, 35, 54514);
	Interface.child(0,33601,10,17);
	Interface.child(1,33602,110,176);
	Interface.child(2,33603,303,176);
	Interface.child(3,33604,200,238);
	Interface.child(4,33605,475,26);
	Interface.child(5,33606,199,266);
	Interface.child(6,33607,199,266);
	Interface.child(7,33608,127,201);
	Interface.child(8,33609,127,201);
	Interface.child(9,33610,53,176);
	Interface.child(10,33611,233,176);
	Interface.child(11,33612,268,176);
	Interface.child(12,33613,445,176);
	Interface.child(13,33614,341,201);
	Interface.child(14,33615,341,201);
	Interface.child(15,33616,51,279);
	Interface.child(16,33617,51,279);
}[/code]
